explains: n. 重要性，重点强调；重读，强调；（表达的）强有力
wordGroup: emphasis on 着重于；对…的强调
put emphasis on 重视，强调；把重点放在……
lay emphasis on 强调；把重点放在
place emphasis on 重视；强调
give emphasis to vt. 强调（着重）

sentences.en: The course has a vocational emphasis.
sentences.cn: 这门课程着重职业培训。

sentences.en: Too much emphasis is placed on research.
sentences.cn: 把重点过多地放在研究上。

sentences.en: Our company puts the emphasis on quality.
